title: Fragment, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: slashed satin weave
description: Plain satin in a dull red color with a design of small T-shaped splashes, 2 cm apart, in staggered rows. Selvage consists of three yellow and two red stripes in satin with edging in plain cloth weave using five warp threads.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 17th century.Medium: silk
Technique: slashed satin weave. 1942-39-1.
